meanings.sent1: She always prefers to work standup at her desk.
meanings.sent2: The singer sang standup during the concert.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried to walk standup on its hind legs.
meanings.sent4: The tree stood standup tall against the wind.
meanings.sent5: The students had to present their projects standup in front of the class.

meanings.definition: A comedian who performs comedy while standing.
meanings.sent1: The standup made everyone laugh with his jokes.
meanings.sent2: I enjoy watching standup on TV.
meanings.sent3: The standup had the audience in stitches with his funny stories.
meanings.sent4: She was the best standup at the comedy club.
meanings.sent5: The standup's performance was the highlight of the night.

meanings.definition: A type of comedy performance where the comedian stands on stage and tells jokes.
meanings.sent1: The standup at the comedy show was hilarious.
meanings.sent2: I love going to watch standup at the comedy club.
meanings.sent3: The standup had the audience rolling with laughter.
meanings.sent4: She decided to try her hand at standup comedy.
meanings.sent5: The standup routine was a hit with the crowd.
